snippet: No player since Garry Kasparov has been able to master elite simultaneous exhibitions, but Veselin Topalov decided to give it a try.
lead_paragraph: No player since Garry Kasparov has been able to master elite simultaneous exhibitions, but Veselin Topalov decided to give it a try.

headline.main: Ex-Champion Takes on National Team From Ireland
headline.seo: Chess: Topalov Takes on the Irish National Team
headline.print_headline: Ex-Champion Takes On National Team From Ireland
